_sText:
Creator, my friend Error asked me for uploading this amazing map here. This map was created for such popular russian game as "Mafia". 
If you want to know more about this game, type mafia game in the google (not adv:D)
This map has both inside and outside areas. Spawn points for Ts are situated outside, CTs are inside. At the beginning of the round all Ts have to occupy armchairs, which have their own number.
When mafia has chosen a player, CTs have to use control-panel near the main door, which will teleport a player to the bonfire.
There are 23 seats and awesome atmosphere inside.
Have a nice game.
Hope you will enjoy this map!!!
